text: leonard_hofstadter See , the liquid metal Terminators were created in the future by Skynet , and Skynet was developed by Miles Dyson , but that future no longer exists , due to Dyson 's death in Terminator 2 .

sheldon_cooper Okay , then riddle me this . Assuming all the good Terminators were originally evil Terminators created by Skynet but then reprogrammed by the future John Connor , why would Skynet , an artificial computer intelligence , bother to create a petite hot 17 year - old killer robot ?
leonard_hofstadter Skynet is kinky ? I do n't know .
sheldon_cooper Artificial intelligences do not have teen fetishes .
leonard_hofstadter Alright , oh wait , they use it to in ... .
sheldon_cooper , too late , I win .
penny Let 's go - oh - oh Ou - oooo - ut tonight . I have to go - oh - oh - oh ou - ooooo - ut tonight .
leonard_hofstadter What the hell is that ?
sheldon_cooper I do n't know , but if cats could sing , they 'd hate it too .
penny You wanna prowl , be my night owl , we 'll take my ... Hey guys , hi ! Where you going ?
leonard_hofstadter What ? Oh we just had to ... mail some letters and throw away some chicken .
penny You 'll never guess what just happened .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , I give up .

sheldon_cooper I do n't guess . As a scientist I reach conclusions based on observation and experimentation , although as I 'm saying this it occurs to me you may have been employing a rhetorical device rendering my response moot .
penny What was that ?
leonard_hofstadter Believe it or not , personal growth . What happened ?
penny Alright , remember when I auditioned for that workshop production of Rent , but I did n't get it and I could n't figure out why ?
sheldon_cooper I have a conclusion based on an observation .
leonard_hofstadter No you do n't . No he does n't .
penny Well , the girl they picked to play Mimi , she dropped out and they asked me to replace her .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , congratulations , what a lucky break .
penny It 's not a big deal , just a one night showcase , but they invite a lot of casting people and agents so , you never know .
sheldon_cooper I think I know .
leonard_hofstadter No you do n't . He does n't .
penny It 's this Friday at eight , you guys want to come ?
together No .
leonard_hofstadter Because ... uh , Friday , we are attending a symposium on molecular positronium .
sheldon_cooper I think that 's a week from Tuesday at six .
leonard_hofstadter No , it 's this Friday , at eight .
penny Oh , too bad , well , I got to get to rehearsal , see you guys .
leonard_hofstadter See you .
sheldon_cooper You just lied to Penny .
leonard_hofstadter Yes , I did .
sheldon_cooper And you did it so casually , no rapid breathing , no increase in perspiration .
leonard_hofstadter So ?
sheldon_cooper So , lack of a physiological response while lying is characteristic of a violent sociopath .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , are you worried about your safety .
sheldon_cooper No , I imagine if you were going to kill me you 'd have done it a long time ago .
leonard_hofstadter That 's very true .
sheldon_cooper Leonard , Leonard , Leonard ... .
leonard_hofstadter What ?
sheldon_cooper I need to speak to you .
leonard_hofstadter It 's two o'clock in the morning .
sheldon_cooper It 's important .
leonard_hofstadter I highly doubt that . Go away . . Are you still out there ?
sheldon_cooper Yes .
leonard_hofstadter What ?
sheldon_cooper You 're right , it can wait until morning .
leonard_hofstadter What , what , what , what , what ?
sheldon_cooper Never mind . I clearly woke you up in the middle of a REM cycle , you 're in no state to talk .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , what is it ?
sheldon_cooper I 'm uncomfortable having been included in your lie to Penny .
leonard_hofstadter What was I supposed to say .
sheldon_cooper You could have told her the truth .
leonard_hofstadter That would have hurt her feelings .
sheldon_cooper Is that a relevant factor ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
sheldon_cooper Then I suppose you could have agreed to go .
leonard_hofstadter And what would I have said afterwards ?

sheldon_cooper I would suggest something to the effect of , singing is neither an appropriate vocation nor avocation for you , and if you disagree , I 'd recommend you have a CAT scan , to look for a tumour pressing on the cognitive processing center of your brain .
leonard_hofstadter I could n't say that , I would have to say , you were terrific and I ca n't wait to hear you sing again .
sheldon_cooper Why ?
leonard_hofstadter It 's the social protocol , it 's what you do when you have a friend who 's proud of something they really suck at .
sheldon_cooper I was not aware of that .
leonard_hofstadter Well now you are .
sheldon_cooper Oh , alright . Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
sheldon_cooper When we played chess earlier , you were terrific and I ca n't wait to play you again . Goodnight .
sheldon_cooper Leonard , Leonard , Leonard , Leonard , ... .
leonard_hofstadter Oooaw . This would be so much easier if I were a violent sociopath . What ?
sheldon_cooper I was analyzing our lie , and I believe we 're in danger of Penny seeing through the ruse .
leonard_hofstadter How ?

sheldon_cooper Simple . If she were to log on to www.socalphysicsgroup.org/activities/other , click on upcoming events , scroll down to seminars , download the pdf schedule , and look for the seminar on molecular positronium , well then , bippidy - boppidy - boo , our pants are metaphorically on fire .
sheldon_cooper Well , sir , my trousers will not be igniting today .
sheldon_cooper Penny , Penny , Penny , Good morning .
penny Do you have any idea what time it is ?

sheldon_cooper Of course I do . My watch is linked to the atomic clock in Boulder , Colorado . It 's accurate to one tenth of a second . But as I 'm saying this it occurs to me that once again your question may have been rhetorical .
penny What do you want ?
sheldon_cooper Remember how Leonard told you we could n't come to your performance because we were attending a symposium on molecular positronium ?
penny I remember symposium .
sheldon_cooper Yes , well , he lied .
penny Wait , what ?
sheldon_cooper He lied , and I 'm feeling very uncomfortable about it .
penny Well imagine how I 'm feeling .
sheldon_cooper Hungry ? Tired ? I 'm sorry this really is n't my strong suit .
leonard_hofstadter You told her I lied , why would you tell her I lied ?
sheldon_cooper To help you .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm sorry , I 'm not seeing the help .
sheldon_cooper She was going to see through your lie eventually , so I told her that you were lying to protect me .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , I 'm getting a bad feeling .

sheldon_cooper Hunger ? Indigestion , I 'm sorry I 'm really not very good at this . Anyway , Penny now believes that on Friday night , we 're going to participate in my cousin Leopold 's drug intervention .
leonard_hofstadter Your cousin Leopold ?
sheldon_cooper Yea , who most people call Leo , but he also answers to Lee , remember that , it 's important .
leonard_hofstadter What 's important ?
sheldon_cooper Details , Leonard , the success or failure of our deceitful enterprise turns on details .
leonard_hofstadter Do you have a cousin Leopold .
sheldon_cooper No , I made him up . I think you 'd call him Lee .
leonard_hofstadter I do n't get it , I already told her a lie , why replace it with a different lie ?
sheldon_cooper Well , first of all , your lie was laughably transparent , where mine is exquisitely convoluted . While you were sleeping I was weaving an un - unravelable web .
leonard_hofstadter Un - unravelable ?
sheldon_cooper Yes , if she googles Leopold Houston she 'll find a facebook page , an online blog depicting his descent into drug use , and a desperate yet hopeful listing on e-harmony.com .
leonard_hofstadter Okay , why would I go to a drug intervention for your cousing .
sheldon_cooper Ah , because it 's in Long Beach , and I do n't drive .
leonard_hofstadter We 're going to Long Beach ?
sheldon_cooper No , of course not , there 's no cousin Leo , there 's no intervention , focus Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , come on !
sheldon_cooper We just leave the house on Friday night , and we return in the wee hours emotionally wrung out from the work of convincing Leo to go back into rehab .
leonard_hofstadter So he goes back into rehab ?
sheldon_cooper Yes , but , he can relapse if Penny ever invites us to go hear her sing again .
leonard_hofstadter You still told her I lied .
sheldon_cooper For a noble purpose , to spare me the social embarrassment of having a drug - addled first cousin , which I 'm assuming is embarrassing , yes ?
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know . How am I supposed to remember all of this .

sheldon_cooper That 's the best part , you do n't have to , see I told Penny that you would be embarrassed , if you knew that she found out that you had lied , so she 's agreed to operate as if the original lie was still in force .
leonard_hofstadter So she 's expecting me to lie about going to a symposium in Pasadena , when in actuality we 're pretending to go to a drug intervention in Long Beach ?
sheldon_cooper Un - unravelable .
leonard_hofstadter Oh hey Penny , wow , look at you , all ready for your showcase , you look great .
penny Thanks . I just wanted to come by and wish you guys luck with your symposium .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , well , thankyou .

penny You know , I got to tell you , a lot of friends would let their friend go alone , but that 's not who you are , you are the kind of guy who stands by a friend when ... when he has a symposium to go to .
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know what to say .
penny It 's okay , Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , okay , alright , good .
howard_wolowitz Oh boy , group hug .
penny Uh - huh !
howard_wolowitz Uh - huh ?
penny Uh - huh !
howard_wolowitz Okay . So what 's up ?

sheldon_cooper Well , uh , Penny is on her way to perform in a one night showcase production of Rent , which we are unable to attend because we are going to a symposium on molecular positronium , given by Dr Emile Farminfarmian .
howard_wolowitz Wait a minute , Farminfarmian is speaking and you 're Bogarding the symposium .
leonard_hofstadter Howard , I 'm sorry ... we 're ... we 're .
howard_wolowitz No , no , you 're quark - blocking us .
leonard_hofstadter I do n't know what to say .
howard_wolowitz Wow .
leonard_hofstadter Howard , listen ... .
howard_wolowitz No , it 's okay , it 's your Millenium Falcon , you and Chewbacca do whatever you want to do . Me and Princess Leia here will find some other way to spend the evening .
penny Howard , wait . Sheldon , I think we should tell them .
sheldon_cooper Okay , sure . I do n't see a problem with that .
penny There 's no symposium , Leonard lied to me , is n't that right Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Well ... I do n't know what to say .
penny It 's okay , I do , look , Leonard is helping Sheldon through a family crisis , he made up the whole story about the symposium with Dr Farmin .. farm ... ian .
sheldon_cooper Good for you .

penny Hah , yeah ! Because he did n't want Sheldon to be embarrassed , and there is nothing to be embarrassed okay , every family in America has a relative holed up in a garage somewhere huffing paint thinner .
howard_wolowitz No , I 'm lost too , I think she skipped a step .

penny No , look , Sheldon 's cousin Leo escaped rehab , and he 's in a Motel 8 at Long Beach , the whole family 's going out for an intervention . Leonard is driving Sheldon down there to help him through this because he 's such a good man .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , another hug , thank you .
penny Alright you guys , good luck .
leonard_hofstadter Thanks Penny .
howard_wolowitz Yeah , uh , break a leg .
sheldon_cooper Break a leg .
howard_wolowitz So , road trip to Long Beach .
leonard_hofstadter No , we 're not going to Long Beach .
raj_koothrappali Why not ?
leonard_hofstadter Because Sheldon does n't have a drug addicted cousin Leopold .
raj_koothrappali Oh , too bad . I 've always wanted to go to Long Beach .

sheldon_cooper It 's a very nice community . The Queen Mary is docked there , once the largest ocean liner in the world , it 's now a hotel and restaurant where they host a surprisingly gripping murder mystery dinner .
raj_koothrappali Sounds fun .
howard_wolowitz I 'm game .
raj_koothrappali Shotgun .
sheldon_cooper No , no , no , Leonard gets nauseous unless he sits in front , and even then it 's iffy .
leonard_hofstadter Wait , are we really going to Long Beach ?
sheldon_cooper Leonard , Leonard , Leonard ... .
leonard_hofstadter Let it go , Sheldon , the murderer was the first mate whether it makes sense to you or not .

sheldon_cooper No , that 's the least of our worries . I 've been doing some research on addiction , both the biochemical and behavioral aspects , and I think there 's a problem with the current version of our lie .
leonard_hofstadter What are you talking about , it 's fine , she bought it , it 's over .
sheldon_cooper Sadly , it 's not . Substance abuse is a lifelong struggle , but beyond that I have realized that the Leo I described would not have agreed to go to rehab .
leonard_hofstadter Why not ?
sheldon_cooper Because Leo is a middle child .
leonard_hofstadter There is no Leo , how can you say that ?

sheldon_cooper You did n't read the bio , did you ? He 's not just a middle child , he 's the quintessential middle child , from a broken home to boot . Psychologically speaking , the attention he gets by rebelling even to the point of self - destruction is more emotionally valuable than the help he would get at rehab .
leonard_hofstadter I 've got a solution .
sheldon_cooper Great , what is it ?
leonard_hofstadter Get out .

sheldon_cooper Fine . I 've hesitated to point this out , but I must now remind you that we are in our current predicament because of your initial and totally inadequate deceit . I 'm just trying to clean up after your mess . We 'll talk in the morning .
strange_man Morning .
leonard_hofstadter Who are you ?
man I am Sheldon 's cousin Leo .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , God ! Sheldon does not have a cousin Leo .

man Au contraire . I 'm 26 years old , I 'm originally from Denton , Texas , but I was a Navy brat so I was brought up on a variety of military bases around the world , as a result I 've often felt like an outsider , never really fitting in , which is probably the reason for my substance abuse problem .
sheldon_cooper Excuse me , we just went over this . As the quintessential middle child , your addiction is rooted in your unmet need for attention .
man Oh , Sheldon , are we really going to go with pop psychology .
sheldon_cooper For your information , this is all based on solid research , stick with the character profile I wrote for you .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon ?
sheldon_cooper I 'm sorry , Leonard , this is Toby Loobenfeld , he 's a research assistant in the particle physics lab , but he also minored in theatre at MIT .
toby_loobenfeld It was more of a double major actually . Theatre and physics . You can guess which one my bourgeois parents pushed me towards .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , I got it , Sheldon , why ?
sheldon_cooper Well , you see , while Leo would not have gone into rehab , it is completely plausible that we would have talked him into leaving the motel , and coming home with us .
leonard_hofstadter Oh ... !
toby_loobenfeld Sheldon , how about this as my motivation . When I was fourteen years old I was abused in the Philippines by a club footed Navy chaplain .
sheldon_cooper No . We 're going with middle child , and a generic predisposition to inadequate serotonin production .
toby_loobenfeld Swell , how do I play genetic predisposition ?
sheldon_cooper Subtextually , of course . Just have fun with it . Morning Penny .
penny Hi . How did the intervention go .
sheldon_cooper Unfortunately , we were n't able to convince him to go to rehab .
penny Well , based on what you told me , I 'm not surprised .
sheldon_cooper But we did convince him to leave the motel . Come say hello . Leo , this is Penny , our friend and neighbor .
penny Hi Leo , how are you feeling ?
toby_loobenfeld Let me ask you something , Penny . Have you ever woken up in a fleabag motel , covered in your own vomit , next to a transsexual prostitute ?
penny No .
toby_loobenfeld Then do n't ask me how I 'm feeling .
leonard_hofstadter Well , that 's Leo . Hey , um , why do n't you tell me about your showcase last night ?
penny Oh , it was okay I guess , was n't a big turn out but they both really seemed to like it .
leonard_hofstadter There were only two people there ?
penny By the end . Yeah .
toby_loobenfeld Damn you , Chaplain Horrigan !
penny I 'm ... I 'm sorry .

toby_loobenfeld The Philippines . 1992 . The Subic Bay Naval Station . A young boy on the cusp of manhood . His only companions mongrel dogs and malarial mosquitos . Desperate and alone he reached out to a man who promised to introduce him to a merciful , loving God , but who instead introduced him to a gin pickled tongue shoved down his adolescent throat . What choice did he have but to drink , shoot and snort his pain away .
sheldon_cooper Do n't forget his genetic predisposition towards addiction .
toby_loobenfeld That 's never been proven .
sheldon_cooper There have been studies .
toby_loobenfeld Not double blind studies .
sheldon_cooper How could there be a double blind study , who would be the control group .
leonard_hofstadter As you can see , detoxing can get pretty ugly , let 's give them some privacy .
penny Yeah . Hey , do you want to come over to my place , have coffee ?
leonard_hofstadter Sounds good .
penny I have a video of me singing last night , do you want to see it ?
leonard_hofstadter Gee , why would n't I ?
penny This is even better than you coming to the showcase , because now I get to watch you watch me .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah ! Funny how things work out .
toby_loobenfeld And that he loved the companionship and the wisdom that his own father failed to provide .
sheldon_cooper Your parents made the right decision .
toby_loobenfeld I can not work like this !
toby_loobenfeld This is amazing . Just sitting on a couch , watching TV with a woman . Not being drunk , or high , or ... or ... wondering if you 're a dude down there .
penny Leo , you are a very sweet , really funny guy . You 're gon na do okay .
toby_loobenfeld One day at a time , Penny , one day at a time .
leonard_hofstadter How long is he going to stay here .
sheldon_cooper He 's a homeless drug addict , Leonard , where is he going to go ? Boy , you have a lot to learn about lying .
